data.message: But how , or will it automatically do it?

replies.message: Hey Teresa. Safety Check is a website that can be accessed here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. To learn more, visit: http://on.fb.me/1wm6VFE. -Chantal

Thank u my friend! Hey while I have a chance , I have a question. I see an email address on my settings or somewhere that is teresa.wiley.50.facebook. My son is who first set up my page. I CAN not remember this password. I know my password for wileyteresa@att.net   I think this is why I can not post things , like a song or a cute picture. I can share things. But I can not post , say from the Internet. It ask me for password for the teresa.wiley.50.facebook.   Can you please help me out on this? Thank you!
